alert.note: Alert for Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 7:31PM CDT until May 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CLAY COUNTY... At 731 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Henrietta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Henrietta, Petrolia, Dean, Jolly, and northern Lake Arrowhead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
